; Purpose
* [[Property description::Contains the irradiation time of an experiment or molecular process.@en]]

; Datatype
* [[Has type::Quantity]].

; Values
* Input fields should be restricted to positive numbers (<nowiki>regexp=/^([0-9]*\.)?[0-9]*$/</nowiki>).

; Label
* [[Has preferred property label::t &#91;h&#93;.@en]]

; Corresponds
* [[Corresponds to::1 h]]
* [[Corresponds to::3600 s]]

; Unit
* [[Display units::h]]
